content.description:
Where do Spanish climbers go to escape the heat when it's sweltering hot in Siurana and Rodellar?  The answer:  Teverga.  Due to its proximity to the northern Atlantic coast you can find perfect sending conditions in the shade (the sun is still pretty intense). 

How To Get There
Teverga is a tiny village in Las Ubi√±as - La Mesa Park, approximately 45 minutes by car from Oviedo, the capital of the Autonomous Community Asturia.
